page.title: 05PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: WE SOMETIMES PLAY BALL TIG. YOU GET TWO BALLS AND YOU THROW THEM AT PEOPLE'S LEGS BELOW THE KNEE, AND ONCE IT HAS HIT THEM THEY ARE OUT UNTIL THE NEXT TIME. WE ALSO PLAY FOOTBALL. THE TEAMS ARE USUALLY BOYS AGAINST GIRLS. IN THE SUMMER WE PLAY ROUNDERS AND NETBALL. WE PLAY A GAME THAT WE CALL POCK BALL. YOU GET TWO BALLS AND THE PERSON WHO HAS THE BALLS RUNS ABOUT WITH THEM. SOMEBODY HAS TO CATCH YOU, BUT BEFORE THEY CATCH YOU, YOU HAVE TO GET RID OF THE BALL. IF THEY CATCH YOU BEFORE YOU GET RID OF IT YOU HAVE TO STAND WITH YOUR LEGS APART. YOU CAN GET FREED IF A BALL IS PASSED BETWEEN YOUR LEGS, BUT THE PERSON WHO CAUGHT YOU CANNOT FREE YOU.
